mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ORDER BY rno DESC ) WHERE rn > ( #{cri.pageNum} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount}
